definition: (of an expanse of water) vast/distant and indistinct/tiny or insignificant

sentences.english: That, at the resurrection, our bodies shall be transformed into absolutely ethereal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 復活時，我們的身體將變爲絕對虛無縹渺的東西。

sentences.english: Throughout that night I lay in the purple limbo between sleeping and waking.
sentences.chinese: 我在半睡半醒的縹渺的幻境中度過整夜。
